TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed SymAddressKind extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies address types for local variables, parameters, and fields in the methods <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.DefineLocalVariable%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.DefineParameter%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.DefineField%2A> of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `addr1`, `addr2`, and `addr3` parameters refer to the address parameters in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter> interface methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind BitField = int32(9)

Docs.summary: A bit field. The parameter is the position where the field starts, and the parameter is the field length.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind ILOffset = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) offset. The parameter is the MSIL local variable or parameter index.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind NativeOffset = int32(5)

Docs.summary: A native offset. The parameter is the offset from the start of the parent.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind NativeRegister = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A native register address. The parameter is the register in which the variable is stored.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind NativeRegisterRegister = int32(6)

Docs.summary: A register-relative address. The parameter is the low-order register, and the parameter is the high-order register.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind NativeRegisterRelative = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A register-relative address. The parameter is the register, and the parameter is the offset.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind NativeRegisterStack = int32(7)

Docs.summary: A register-relative address. The parameter is the low-order register, the parameter is the stack register, and the parameter is the offset from the stack pointer to the high-order part of the value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind NativeRVA = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A native Relevant Virtual Address (RVA). The parameter is the RVA in the module.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind NativeSectionOffset = int32(10)

Docs.summary: A native section offset. The parameter is the section, and the parameter is the offset.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymAddressKind NativeStackRegister = int32(8)

Docs.summary: A register-relative address. The parameter is the stack register, the parameter is the offset from the stack pointer to the low-order part of the value, and the parameter is the high-order register.
